a.h1: USD 363 Holcomb School District We are ALL Longhorns!

li.a: Tech Tips to Help at Home
New to the District??? Enroll Here.

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.style: border: solid 1px #ffffff; padding: 8px 10px; border-radius: 12px; display: inline-block; background: #000000; margin-left: 5px;

div.p: Food from the Horns for Hope Food Pantry will be made available for those needing food. Please contact Amy Wickwar at 640-8187 or Shelly Schap at 277-2063 to request food. Pick-up will be made curbside only in front of the high school from 1:00-3:00 PM on Wednesdays.
Although there is no school listed on the School Calendar for Friday, April 24, meals WILL be served at the normal times and sites in Holcomb.

Has your family been placed on a mandatory home quarantine? If the answer is yes, please click on the following link to see your options for home delivery of Grab N Go meals for children age 1 to 18. https://5il.co/ei6x
Use the link below for the special board meeting Tuesday, April 21, 2020 @8:30AM - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dTC2kxQKmM0

The Holcomb High School graduating class would like to recognize Gracelyn Rupp as the class of 2020 Valedictorian and Lauren Jones as the 2020 Salutatorian. They both have achieved great things @HHSLonghorns and will continue to achieve in the next chapter. Congrats #LonghornVIP

p.a: Event: KSHSAA State Music Solos and Small Ensambles

div.p: Homeschool Spirit Week Covid-19 style! Week of April 20-24 / Homeschool Spirit Week ¡Estilo Covid-19! Semana del 20 al 24 de abril
All events have been cancelled due to COVID-19. Food Service WILL continue to provide Grab-N-Go meals as planned. If you have any questions, please contact the district office at 620-277-2629.
